name: Escape from Planet Eurydice!
description:
Made in 48 hours for GMTK Jam 2022, with the theme "Roll The Dice".

A dice-rolling game about leading your crew to escape from an unfolding disaster!

Your crew is represented by dice, which are rolled each turn. Most die faces will do something useful, like generating data or unlocking doors with keycards. But if you roll a skull, that die will be permanently lost!

Make use of rerolls, movement bonuses, and extra dice that you find throughout your escape in order to survive for 100 rooms and make it to the escape shuttle.
